lexUnit.name: allergic.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: of, caused by, or relating to an allergy.

sentence.text: One of the most beneficial substances to use as a face pack is yogurt ( live , natural yogurt , full-fat if possible ) ; beneficial , that is , if you are not allergic to dairy products .

Some people are allergic to insects .
